players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I am the detective and I found out Bob is the mafioso"
Charlie: "Charlie remains silent, as I have no new information to share."
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night. The detective is Alice, as she figured it out. Charlie remains silent, so he might be a villager or another mafia member."
You: "I am the detective and I know Bob is the mafioso. Charlie remains silent, so he could be a villager or another mafia member. I will continue to investigate."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
